update t_video
cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER},
size = #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cuser = #{cuser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
muser = #{muser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_video set cover = #{cover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fileName = #{filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cuser = #{cuser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, muser = #{muser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
